messages.subject: Re: I just jumped off a cliff....and it feels so right. ..
messages.messageBody:
<<It seems to me that art is something that should be explored not forced. I
too would dislike anything that someone told me I had to do.>>

I've told my kids they have to watch TV. <g>

I've forbidden them to go to their rooms and made them watch just whatever's
on TV until the end of a half hour sometimes if they were particularly out of
hand or too angry for human company. Not lately, because they're all for
some unknown reason being sweet and reasonable all at the same time. Kirby
was in an adolescent funk, but for the past two weeks he can touch his sister
nicely and say polite things to my friends and all KINDS of weird stuff. <g>
It will probably pass as another wave of body-changing hormones wash through,
but it's a nice break.

Sandra
